com.smartthings.sdk.client.methods

Interface SchedulesApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiClient.Api

    public interface SchedulesApi
extends ApiClient.Api

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Schedule createSchedule(java.lang.String installedAppId, java.lang.String authorization, ScheduleRequest request)
      Save an installed app schedule.

    • Method Detail

      • createSchedule

        Schedule createSchedule(java.lang.String installedAppId,
                        java.lang.String authorization,
                        ScheduleRequest request)
        Save an installed app schedule. Create a schedule for an installed app. The installed app must be in the location specified and the installed app must have permission to create schedules.
        Parameters:
        installedAppId - The ID of the installed application. (required)
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        request - The schedule to be created. (optional)
        Returns:
        Schedule

      • deleteSchedule

        DeleteScheduleResponse deleteSchedule(java.lang.String installedAppId,
                                      java.lang.String scheduleName,
                                      java.lang.String authorization)
        Delete a schedule. Delete a specific schedule for the installed app.
        Parameters:
        installedAppId - The ID of the installed application. (required)
        scheduleName - The name of the schedule (required)
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        Returns:
        DeleteScheduleResponse

      • deleteSchedules

        DeleteScheduleResponse deleteSchedules(java.lang.String installedAppId,
                                       java.lang.String authorization)
        Delete all of an installed app's schedules. Delete all schedules for the installed app.
        Parameters:
        installedAppId - The ID of the installed application. (required)
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        Returns:
        DeleteScheduleResponse

      • getSchedule

        Schedule getSchedule(java.lang.String installedAppId,
                     java.lang.String scheduleName,
                     java.lang.String authorization)
        Get an installed app's schedule. Get a specific schedule for the installed app.
        Parameters:
        installedAppId - The ID of the installed application. (required)
        scheduleName - The name of the schedule (required)
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        Returns:
        Schedule

      • getSchedules

        PagedSchedules getSchedules(java.lang.String installedAppId,
                            java.lang.String authorization)
        List installed app schedules. List the schedules for the installed app.
        Parameters:
        installedAppId - The ID of the installed application. (required)
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        Returns:
        PagedSchedules
